title: Army-run school stokes hijab controversy in Kashmir, later limits diktat to face veil - Deccan Herald
content: Army-run school stokes hijab controversy in Kashmir, later limits diktat to face veil  Deccan HeraldView Full coverage on Google News
description: An Army-run school in Baramulla district has stoked a controversy by asking its staff to avoid wearing hijab during school hours, prompting criticism by the Jammu and Kashmirâ€™s mainstream political parties.
